languages.text: {n}Фелек Орселлио выглядит немного лучше — спутанные волосы теперь сплетены в тугие косы, раны крепко перетянуты, а под чешуйками на щеках проступил легкий румянец.{/n} "Вы избавились от угрозы и запитали подъемник... Прекрасная работа. Надеюсь, жезл активации тоже при вас? Помните — каждая секунда может стоить госпоже жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фелек Орселлио выглядит немного лучше — спутанные волосы теперь сплетены в тугие косы, раны крепко перетянуты, а под чешуйками на щеках проступил легкий румянец.{/n} "Вы избавились от угрозы и запитали подъемник... Прекрасная работа. Надеюсь, жезл активации тоже при вас? Помните — каждая секунда может стоить госпоже жизни".

languages.text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."
languages.original_text: {n}Фелек Орселлио выглядит немного лучше — спутанные волосы теперь сплетены в тугие косы, раны крепко перетянуты, а под чешуйками на щеках проступил легкий румянец.{/n} "Вы избавились от угрозы и запитали подъемник... Прекрасная работа. Надеюсь, жезл активации тоже при вас? Помните — каждая секунда может стоить госпоже жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — the matted hair is now neatly braided, the wounds are tightly bandaged and there is a healthy blush under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threats and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, a second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, a second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

{n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

languages.text: {n}Felek Orsellio sieht schon etwas besser aus — sein zerzaustes Haar ist nun ordentlich geflochten, die Wunden sind frisch verbunden und unter den Schuppen auf seinen Wangen hat seine Haut eine gesunde Farbe.{/n} "Ihr habt die Bedrohung eliminiert und die Stromversorgung des Aufzugs wiederhergestellt ... Gut gemacht. Gewiss habt Ihr auch den Aktivierungsstab dabei? Denkt daran, jede Sekunde kann meine Herrin das Leben kosten."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek Orsellio sieht schon etwas besser aus — sein zerzaustes Haar ist nun ordentlich geflochten, die Wunden sind frisch verbunden und unter den Schuppen auf seinen Wangen hat seine Haut eine gesunde Farbe.{/n} "Ihr habt die Bedrohung eliminiert und die Stromversorgung des Aufzugs wiederhergestellt ... Gut gemacht. Gewiss habt Ihr auch den Aktivierungsstab dabei? Denkt daran, jede Sekunde kann meine Herrin das Leben kosten."

languages.text: {n}Felek Orsellio semble se porter un peu mieux : ses cheveux emmêlés sont maintenant soigneusement tressés, ses plaies bandées, et il a retrouvé de belles couleurs sous les écailles de ses joues.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|occupé|occupée} de la menace et avez alimenté l'ascenseur... C'est du beau travail. Avez-vous aussi rapporté la tige d'activation ? N'oubliez pas, chaque seconde d'hésitation risque de coûter la vie à ma maîtresse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek Orsellio semble se porter un peu mieux : ses cheveux emmêlés sont maintenant soigneusement tressés, ses plaies soigneusement bandées, et il a retrouvé de belles couleurs sous les écailles de ses joues.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|occupé|occupée} de la menace et avez alimenté l'ascenseur... C'est du beau travail. Avez-vous aussi rapporté la tige d'activation ? N'oubliez pas, chaque seconde d'hésitation risque de coûter la vie à ma maîtresse. »

languages.text: {n}费雷克·奥赛罗看起来好了些。他原本打结的头发已经编成了整齐的辫子，伤口已经被包扎好了，脸颊的鳞片下也泛起了健康的血色。{/n}“您解决了威胁，启动了电梯……干得漂亮，我猜您应该也把控制手杖带来了吧？记住，我们每犹豫一分一秒，我的女主人都可能会因此丧命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}费雷克·奥塞罗看起来好了些。他原本打结的头发已经编成了整齐的辫子，伤口已经被包扎好了，脸颊的鳞片下也泛起了健康的红晕。{/n}“您解决了威胁，启动了电梯……干得漂亮，我猜您应该也把控制手杖带来了吧？记住，我们每犹豫一分一秒，我的女主人都可能会因此丧命。”

languages.text: {n}フェレック・オーセリオは少し持ち直したようだ。ボサボサの髪はキチンとまとめられて、傷にはしっかり包帯が巻かれ、頬の鱗の下は健康的に赤らんでいる。{/n}「あなたは脅威に立ち向かって、エレベーターに電力を供給してくれた…素晴らしい。起動ロッドも持ってきてくれたのだな？忘れないでくれ、一瞬の迷いが我が主の命を脅かす」
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}フェレック・オーセリオは少し持ち直したようだ。ボサボサの髪はキチンとまとめられて、傷にはしっかり包帯が巻かれ、頬の鱗の下は健康的に赤らんでいる。{/n}「あなたは脅威に立ち向かって、エレベーターに電力を供給してくれた…素晴らしい。あなたが起動ロッドも持ってきてくれたのでは？忘れないでくれ、一瞬の迷いが我が主の命を脅かす」
{n}フェレック・オーセリオは少し持ち直したようだ。ボサボサの髪はキチンとまとめられて、傷にはしっかり包帯が巻かれ、頬の鱗の下は健康的に赤らんでいる。{/n}「あなたは脅威に立ち向かって、エレベーターに電力を供給してくれた…素晴らしい。起動ロッドも持ってきてくれたのだな？忘れないでくれ、一瞬の迷いが我が主の命を脅かす」

languages.text: {n}Felek Orsellio tiene mejor aspecto. Su maraña de pelo ahora está trenzada, sus heridas tienen algunas vendas y parece que algo de color ha vuelto a sus escamosas mejillas.{/n} «Se ha ocupado de la amenaza y ha activado el ascensor... Bien hecho. ¿Ha traído también la vara de control? Recuerde que cada segundo que pasa es decisivo para salvar la vida de mi señora».
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek Orsellio tiene mejor aspecto. Su maraña de pelo ahora está trenzada, las heridas tienen algunas vendas y parece que la vida a vuelto a sus escamosas mejillas.{/n} «Se ha ocupado de la amenaza y ha activado el ascensor... Bien hecho. ¿Ha traído también la vara de control? Recuerde que cada segundo que pasa es decisivo para salvar la vida de mi señora».

languages.text: {n}Felek Orsellio biraz daha iyi görünüyor. Dağınık saçları şimdi düzgünce örülmüş, yaraları sıkıca sarılmış, yanaklarındaki pulların altına bir miktar kan gelmiş hâlde.{/n} "Tehdidin icabına baktın, asansörü de çalıştırdın. Tebrik ederim. Etkinleştirme çubuğunu da getirmişsindir herhâlde. Unutma ki tereddütle geçen her saniye, hanımımın canına mal olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek Orsellio looks a little better — his tangled hair is now neatly braided, his wounds are tightly bandaged, and there is some healthy colour under the scales on his cheeks.{/n} "You dealt with the threat and powered the elevator... Well done. I trust you brought the activation rod as well? Remember, every second of hesitation may cost my mistress her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek Orsellio biraz daha iyi görünüyor. Etkinleştirme çubuğunu da getirmişsindir herhâlde. Unutma ki tereddütle geçen her saniye, hanımımın canına mal olabilir."
